text.div:
BCI StainingControlCS CodeSystem

Staining of control cells, required if staining is negative.

name: StainingControlCS
title: BCI StainingControlCS CodeSystem
publisher: The HL7 Cancer Interoperability Group sponsored by Clinical Interoperability Council Work Group (CIC).
description: Staining of control cells, required if staining is negative.

concept.definition: Internal control cells present and stain as expected - CAP#25896
concept.display: Internal control cells present and stain as expected - CAP#25896

concept.definition: Internal control cells present; no immunoreactivity of either tumor cells or internal controls - CAP#32089
concept.display: Internal control cells present; no immunoreactivity of either tumor cells or internal controls - CAP#32089
